short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom New Tab – Customize Your New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get rid of your boring old New Tab and upgrade to Custom New Tab!

The Custom New Tab extension provides you with the new tab features you look for, in a fun way! Easily view the date and time on a customizable background and perform normal web searches (powered by Bing). With a large selection of fun and fresh backgrounds, you will never get bored of your New Tab again! 

Key Features:
-	Backgrounds you can change easily.
-	Date and time
-	Ability to perform quick web searches

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Custom New Tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab, Homepage takeover, and Default Search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://customnewtab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://customnewtab.com/privacy.html
